title: Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift unveils Netherlands as first foreign start in 2024
content:
The 2024 edition will be seven days in August as the race is slotted into the gap between the Olympics and Paralympics, but features a split stage on day two.

Read the full article at Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift unveils Netherlands as first foreign start in 2024 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
